modName: Snowy or No-Snow Winter Cabin - No Load Screens - Tropical Support
summary: A simple, open cabin located in Riverwood.  New NO-SNOW and Tropical support versions available. No load screens. Basic amenities, a shrine, doomstone, some new food, and a follower are included.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][color=#f6b26b]*To the first 27 downloaders, thank you for checking out my mod.  I was so preoccupied with a clean plugin that I overlooked extra meshes in my .zip file from another mod.  My apologies!  Please delete all files of version 1.[/color]


Updates for version 4:
[list][*][color=#b6d7a8][size=2]New: Tropical Skyrim compatible version.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][size=2][color=#9fc5e8]Snowy version is back![/color]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Version 4 released: tweaks and cleaned zip file (see full changelog)[/size][/*]
[/list]

A simple cabin located in Riverwood with no load screens.  Choose between a snow-covered or standard version, and a tropical compatible version.
[/size]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Modder's note: I created this while testing a new modder resource and decided to share.

The snow-covered version is designed for use with winter enhancing mods, such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61711/?]Skyrim Winter Overhaul[/url], but this mod has no requirements.

The tropical version is designed for use with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Tropical Skyrim[/url].  This mod has no requirements, but the textures will be odd without Tropical Skyrim.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#ffe599][size=3]The cabin features:
[/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]Safe storage inside the cabin.[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=1]Cooking, alchemy, and enchanting stations[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Doomstone (all skills improve 15% faster)[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Shrine[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Archer target[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]2 new food recipes: a fish stew and snowberry treat.[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Two exterior respawning containers: fish on the outside grill, and fishing poles.[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]NPC follower Yul (stealthy and quiet - he shouldn't set off traps, marriageable, comes with basic frost skills) found in Sleeping Giant Inn. [color=#b6d7a8]In the Tropical Skyrim version he has basic fire skills.[/color][/size][/*]
[*][color=#9fc5e8][size=1]The snow version has a snow-covered exterior and interior.  Snow and rain will blow inside the cabin.[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][color=#c9daf8][size=1]
[/size][/color]
For armor crafting needs, go next door to the Riverwood blacksmith shop.


[color=#d5a6bd][size=3]Recipes:[/size][/color]
[list=1][*][color=#c27ba0][size=1]Winter Fish Stew (or Rejuvenating Fish Stew)[/size][size=1]-[/size][/color][color=#ead1dc][size=1] regenerate health, magicka, and stamina 5 points every second for 10 mins.  Requires: salmon, salt, garlic, alto wine.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#c27ba0][size=1]Winter Snowberry Treat (or Rejuvenating Snowberry Treat)[/size][/color][color=#ead1dc][size=1]- regenerate health, magicka, and stamina 1 point every second for 10 mins. Requires: snowberries, moonsugar, ale.[/size][/color]
[/*]
[/list]

[color=#ffe599][size=2]Game Performance:
[/size][/color]
[color=#fce5cd][size=1]To keep performance optimal, I did the following:

[/size][/color][list][*][color=#fce5cd][size=1]Minimal decoration, but enough to give ambiance.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#fce5cd][size=1]Only 3 lights used.  No shadows, they do not light water.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#fce5cd][size=1]Some items have havok turned off.
[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#fce5cd][size=1]Only 1 texture is 2048x2048 (the furniture in the snow-version).[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#fce5cd][size=1]No scripts.[/size][/color][/*]
[/list]
There are several candles inside -- if enb users find the candles too bright, just open the console, click a candle, and type disable.
(If you click the wrong item, just type enable again).


[color=#ffe599][size=2]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[size=2]just Skyrim

[/size]Even the Tropical Skyrim version only needs Skyrim, but the textures will look odd without Tropical Skyrim.


[color=#f9cb9c][size=2]Installation:[/size][/color]
Choose only one version to install.
If using the Tropical Skyrim version, install it after Tropical Skyrim and its patches.  Allow to overwrite.


Extra modder notes:
This house is navmeshed, but I did not finalize the navmesh.
I deleted some original navmesh below the house, but no game objects were deleted (just moved some trees and rocks aside).
There is a map marker "Snowy Cabin" or "Riverside Cabin" for fast travel, but it's not necessary since the cabin is already in Riverwood.


Known bug:
Followers may refuse to use the front door and use the back entrance instead.


[color=#ea9999]Conflicts:[/color]
Leafrest - a beautiful mod, but we share a location.


Credits:
Tamira and Stroti for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61824]house[/url], and Tamira and Phitt for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60125]stools[/url].
The_Funktasm's[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24883/?] Morrowind Style Clutter[/url] for the glazed pottery textures.
flintone's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60165/?]Shabby Furniture[/url] for two furniture textures.
Soolie for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Tropical Skyrim[/url]
author: Tcz
